search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Dovetail (dovetail.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for Dovetail's pricing page is [https://dovetailapp.com/pricing](https://dovetailapp.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Pricing

Start for free
--------------

Upgrade to scale
----------------

Pay yearly and save

##### Free

###### Automatically uncover insights in your customer calls and interviews. Share effortlessly with your team

$0

Automatic summarization

Highlights key moments

Auto tags highlights

###### What you can do

Auto-import and store calls, docs, and survey responses

Transcribe conversations in over 40 languages, and detect speakers

Save highlights across video, audio, documents, and notes

Share auto-generated highlights with your team via Slack, Notion, and more

###### Usage

1 project

Unlimited transcription

Unlimited integrations

Unlimited file uploads

Save 25%

##### Professional

###### Instantly discover insights across all your customer touch points like calls, surveys and support channels

$29

per user/month

billed yearly

Global semantic search

Thematic classification

Auto creates insights

###### Everything in Free, plus:

Ask your data and insights anything

AI summarized results linked to real customer feedback

Customize your workspace with folders, filters, and views

Create project overviews and share in-depth findings as insights

Store, track, and recruit over 3m people to talk to, worldwide

###### Usage

Unlimited projects

Unlimited viewers

250 data points/month in Channels

##### Enterprise

###### Scale insights org-wide with Enterprise-grade features, access controls, and standardization

Contact sales for pricing or to request a demo

Chat with your data in Slack

Automated insights digests

Video, audio, and text redaction

###### Everything in Professional, plus:

Discover insights with conversational AI in Slack and Microsoft Teams

Configure automated text and audio digests with relevant updates

Redact video, audio, and text within transcripts to protect privacy

Control permissions with user roles, groups, and granular access control

Standardize tags, fields, and templates across the workspace

Enable stakeholders to self-service insights with homepage and search

###### Usage

Unlimited everything

* * *

#### $29

$39 billed monthly

* * *

Projects

Quickly analyze and synthesize customer feedback and share insights with stakeholders

* * *

#### Uncover insights

* * *

*   Included projects
    
    ![Image 1](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/7DHc5vZXb9Embeu2fAu6ZH/62cc9f4351efa4fd064a428449079ed3/Your_projectstt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Projects are the main ‘container’. They can contain anything from interviews to survey responses to past research.
    

1

Unlimited

Unlimited

*   Included contributors
    
    ![Image 2](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3rnBQH4EWPyVItZTnopkiQ/9a23e30aec4be48a07966c1d4c08531b/Frame_427321785tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Contributors are users who can upload, analyze, and create insights.
    

1+

1+

10+

*   Calendar integration
    
    ![Image 3](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/6hO2L6wpPobilKf6eGhgz2/84ea39357f75db16e2334b86ccb4034a/Frame_427321787.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Configure all of your customer calls to be automatically uploaded into Dovetail for instant analysis.
    

*   Data-in integrations
    
    ![Image 4](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3ststyq2Nxj53kVVkAZbuM/d82090af212d08b3aa10985425632ce9/Frame_427321786tt-3.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Get started by importing your data from existing tools including Google Drive, Zoom, OneDrive, SharePoint and many more.
    

*   Automation settings
    
    ![Image 5](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2CB4CkOaDSze029QxmIhby/b2f6b0bb12a7c60162340ab79978968d/Frame_427321793tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Choose the level of AI-powered analysis for each project.
    

*   Included viewers
    
    ![Image 6](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2R2TfWu959zf0kC29ae6Ya/64dc2c90121e9f7467d8048d93644996/Frame_427321786rr-12.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    These are users who can read and comment on data and insights, but can’t edit.
    

*   Magic transcribe
    
    ![Image 7](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/6NZYfQ3PJ4mXqcpNvLLpDP/4aae00f594f7a5c7118bbc69cac60261/Frame_427321785tt-1.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Accurately transcribe your audio and video files in 41 languages across different topics, industries, and accents.
    

*   Magic summarize
    
    ![Image 8](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2LKIcK2IEW5W93Vz28QbEu/5877bb9d1e6c6fbf5d0d253c6cbb9677/Frame_427321790tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Automatically summarize notes and identify key takeaways from your insights.
    

*   Magic highlight
    
    ![Image 9](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/1gC2hbiERLqbt6uuifTBY2/a9b24fd2af9f2856106cce9a214646c5/Frame_427321791tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Automatically find key moments in your data by accepting and rejecting suggested highlights.
    

*   Magic cluster
    
    ![Image 10](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5Yjrwwgrxx4gIHKJtDLnpa/d273954f99e636bc712acdf66aee4bb9/Frame_427321785tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Automatically identify, cluster, and label highlights by theme in canvas.
    

*   Magic insight
    
    ![Image 11](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/mMcxjcr6ebbXLGDtkpkVT/05e0416087f127b897422d3b876512d2/Frame_427321792rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    (Coming soon) Dovetail’s AI automatically creates draft insights based on summaries, highlights, and tags within your project.
    

*   Magic search
    
    ![Image 12](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/oZuQSEMZG92t1pN1yBUAF/31f918cf7a4babbbd3c28d5ee0624f00/Frame_427321786rr-13.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Semantic search, advanced filtering, and automatic, evidence-backed summaries make it easy for anyone to find key insights.
    

*   Collaborative editing
    
    ![Image 13](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2HmpMXAwVaqvGcf0L4k0x4/081b7dfe34d8aeee24ab6073e4c7c140/Frame_427321788tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Use canvas to affinity map highlights as a team and find themes together.
    

*   Survey data
    
    ![Image 14](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5bTVkeaAsw7KSBNkfMuGYD/ded7998503f9c140d6ce0e07c3e3ad92/Frame_427321789rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Upload survey response CSVs and AI will instantly summarize and highlight key takeaways.
    

*   Views
    
    ![Image 15](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/7MC1EBwpxrGNeyuryJdVbQ/fe56a9ca1171a4e72a38842612d57855/Frame_427321794tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Customize how you see and work with your data with different views. Includes grid, list, table, board and canvas.
    

*   Remove ums and ahs
    
    ![Image 16](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/0o0nIU8bxKfxAZN3dCxYg/619740d4e698e602dbbb3adf43936157/Frame_427321786tt-4.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Automatically remove the inevitable filler words in natural speech.
    

*   Translation
    
    ![Image 17](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2aLhcVZwif1rGTU1dnURJ3/ef4cf11c2035cc26759dbd0f7bcce476/Frame_427321849tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Translate transcripts and summaries into 75 languages to streamline synthesis and align global teams
    

*   Custom vocabulary
    
    ![Image 18](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/4zNAeYrV6CcntDzUXbWxCH/cf7a65189a6bc8d849ed0c45a889966a/Frame_427321786tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Add specialized or context-specific words to expand your transcription’s vocabulary.
    

#### Organize and share

* * *

*   Web links
    
    ![Image 19](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/25IDqvUQWEa700aFhk2TEQ/721de7d0ffa814700a4be9e80a83d58c/Frame_427321786rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Share a public link, allowing anyone to view data without logging in
    

*   Highlight reels
    
    ![Image 20](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/4hRh0rs5dYVDxOph4zIwV5/0a2591a6d785051ac5c8e0f92c6b5a36/Frame_427321786rr-4.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Stream a playlist of all video and audio highlights for any of the tags created.
    

*   Share-out integrations
    
    ![Image 21](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/1JVzURrgCnnPxvYPBEFtJ8/b8eab6771d9a60f098885c69a5994442/Frame_427321786rr-5.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Share findings with your stakeholders with powerful integrations including Notion, Slack, Jira, Confluence and many more.
    

*   Embed links
    
    ![Image 22](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/7rsR9ySNvMUSA2GsM1YUPq/30c10e00fc7cd5786063cbb9949c916e/Frame_427321786rr-11.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Preview links from the tools you use including Figma, Google Docs, Vimeo and more.
    

*   Insights
    
    ![Image 23](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/297Lu3ck3Wtb4KpIYvhrIO/1af678336b21a8b941473d92416bf247/Frame_427321795rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Summarize your findings into a beautiful report for stakeholders, and embed references to data from your analysis or past findings.
    

*   Comments and mentions
    
    ![Image 24](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/7N2SJEshgNJ8xXES6yCL6g/89664d0ff84a179a79c7088b61881ff8/Frame_427321786rr-2.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Discuss research data and insights, and agree on the next steps as a team.
    

*   Insight metrics
    
    ![Image 25](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/6zsYM8XvAq2YnzbpzpdYj3/6df3ca580728b89cca05f144b6f762a2/Frame_427321786rr-3.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Understand the impact of your work with insight metrics, and discover which parts of your research are resonating with your audience.
    

*   User profiles
    
    ![Image 26](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/18jlpVyPNhGaJw8VfJRDvX/ffd3e7e1dec9fe7f3eacc21b42793f5e/user-profiles-2.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Follow and receive personal notifications when your team contribute new data or publish new insights.
    

*   Folders
    
    ![Image 27](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/7FaKSJNIR0B6DOeGTNiCfM/d7cacb3bb1e2ea1353364346ba87eb3d/Frame_427321786rr-6.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Use folders to group projects based on the team, product, active research projects or department.
    

*   Project and insight templates
    
    ![Image 28](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5L6dW6ZTnEkj6jUapl5RlB/ee3cc1bbf026be23f81d92749ae4188c/Frame_427321786rr-7.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Standardize research across your organization by setting up templates for projects and insights.
    

*   Workspace tags
    
    ![Image 29](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3ettZNCxU4AYXTwPQzewtv/14844b41fc71e76f4148036b467bc70a/Frame_427321786rr-8.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Use workspace tags to set up a tagging taxonomy that spans across your workspace.
    

*   Workspace fields
    
    ![Image 30](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/4evWD1DSoct7Yf343iflVy/9d3a78a466f140c54aa3b105760eb61b/Frame_427321786rr-9.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Set up custom fields across your workspace to add structure and allow your team to get started sooner.
    

*   Custom home and feeds
    
    ![Image 31](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5xkjAajJYSsJm1MAqAuuiu/e19d7a4f1f65cb7fd9f6ee9cfa5ffe01/Frame_427321796rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Customize your workspace home to make it work for your team’s needs. Configure feeds, change the layout, content or use search blocks to keep it feeling fresh.
    

Ask Dovetail

Customer insights at your fingertips in your flow of work \*Sold separately

* * *

*   Conversational chat
    
    ![Image 32](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2MqVdN9Lj7uj9IkubsHYnB/eba86c806137d77e19f7e4a63913b4c8/Frame_427321797rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Ask @Dovetail in a channel, and AI responds with evidence-backed summaries. Ask follow-up questions to refine results.
    

*   Audio insights podcast
    
    ![Image 33](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3PSRPqltz5xHcDjvMrhvMm/91715e3a7add5f28656d906de98aece1/Frame_427321798rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Identify projects that matter to you, and Dovetail curates and delivers a regular podcast-style update with the most relevant information.
    

*   Privacy configuration
    
    ![Image 34](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3C7SqDIte8YnC9o8dcWI7y/eb5e8017eb5bebbdf7dbecb68a7b5bc0/Frame_427321799rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Configure what data types are included in query results to protect sensitive data.
    

*   Unlimited queries
    
    ![Image 35](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2Dcj7scLyn2WTS5S9L7fw3/a410250e2ec491c6356d14cec4bcf1d0/Frame_427321800rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Ask Dovetail is available to anyone in your organization who is using Slack or Teams.
    

Recruit

Easily recruit and build your customer contacts database

* * *

*   Contacts management
    
    ![Image 36](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5c1zXU1XRjh4K7HYRRtZOC/08ed7daf5cc67610f6898dbc0503d5b0/Frame_427321801rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    A database of all of your participants, complete with auto-populated details like job title, skills, geography, and more.
    

*   AI-generated summaries
    
    ![Image 37](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5JhWUK4sqLOk7W8AloeEeE/fc03a6c10ceb468cebcff234676575ad/Frame_427321802rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Instantly see how your contacts have contributed to past research.
    

Participant recruitment

Add on

Set up research studies and source new participants from our pool of 3 million people.

Available on Professional and Enterprise: From $75

Channels

Easily track high-volume customer feedback

* * *

*   Channels included
    
    ![Image 38](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/eaX7IRntEWqBlg5RsLAaA/902990245f4525d99592631ec107836f/Frame_427321804rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    A channel is a container to continuously stream and analyze feedback sources like support tickets, NPS scores, and more.
    

Unlimited

Unlimited

*   Historical trends
    
    ![Image 39](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/7fGszEZ7kxzh4UkRYsEzhs/53c9e5d7622ccd5921e505794c5500a6/Frame_427321805rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Visualize data trends over time, and filter by date so you can hone in on the insights that matter most.
    

Unlimited

Unlimited

*   Data points
    
    ![Image 40](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/4cyttcqF9pBWnzn10bx0ji/f6e27d0a938bc6c9dd43045520f0d565/Frame_427321806rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Dovetail’s AI will automatically analyze and thematically classify data into themes. You have control to merge, split, and create new themes.
    

inc. 250/month

inc. 250/month

Additional data points

Add on

Sitting on mountains of feedback? Add more data capacity to your plan, and let Dovetail’s AI analyze it for you.

1000 data points / month: $500 per month

5000+ data points / month: [Contact sales](https://dovetail.com/contact-sales/)

#### Admin and security

* * *

*   AU, EU and USA data hosting
    
    ![Image 41](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/1g6ooDOrf53Sp66NlBHLsM/8adb1edcafd412502476882dc16cefd3/Frame_427321786111.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    New workspaces can choose to host their data in Australia, Europe or the United States to comply with local data regulations.
    

*   Encrypted data and backups
    
    ![Image 42](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/6Rw3a1BRmCrEgN8S3s667T/564dd341992bac86642c3a4df59ab16e/Frame_427321786ttt-11.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Dovetail utilizes industry-standard practices concerning the encryption of data when stored and while in transmission.
    

*   API access
    
    ![Image 43](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/6o2A0EoEUbcmyOUhe91e6/c1e9872b9ed6ec176b8dc8a7a7619e50/Frame_427321786ttt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Build on top of the Dovetail platform by automating tasks, extracting insights, and managing data more efficiently.
    

*   Access control
    
    ![Image 44](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/65a2x7s5kyAk1neSGXDfE9/89d0b65ed5a4f566600d3ec34bd7719a/Frame_427321786ttt-12.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Control who can manage, view, and edit projects with granular project permissions.
    

*   Single sign-on (SSO)
    
    ![Image 45](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/1gnmAcyoLJmf1QxLcCAiFn/76379107062d4fd1d5b7b98a148daee0/Frame_427321786ttt-13.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Dovetail has built-in single sign-on capabilities for Google and Microsoft accounts, and the option to configure your own managed identity provider.
    

*   User groups
    
    ![Image 46](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2HfZTcgYsoKfon2vYWO4AN/8cfa6d7444b52a56f75163967b91effa/Frame_427321786ttt-14.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Quickly grant access to folders, projects, tag boards, and extensions by user groups that you create and manage.
    

*   Usage analytics
    
    ![Image 47](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2qegbobrak6Ai6oReXldiY/f0db4cde4c41164abf7c7b9083e7f3a1/Frame_427321786ttt-1.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Track the output of your team’s research over time.
    

*   Custom data retention
    
    ![Image 48](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/es2ot639IGXG4ocdx5N44/c2aba01ff196b6a8cd4208fc27fa3541/Frame_427321786ttt-7.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Set up auto-deletion of original videos without losing the video highlights to comply with your policies.
    

*   Data redaction
    
    ![Image 49](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/1O22nC8r2IRPAWpwECGexf/8e7f7342c74ff09ac7c0492234fdf37f/Frame_427321786ttt-9.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Keep your data safe and remove sensitive information by redacting any text, audio, and video.
    

*   Optional HIPAA add-on
    
    ![Image 50](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5FLssDoC7KaWKO2WkdptMa/20ef90a31037d5644602e3b203d4f1bd/Frame_427321786ttt-8.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Our optional HIPAA solution provides access controls and features to help manage PHI, such as advanced restrictions on sharing, access, and data exporting.
    

*   Security reviews
    
    ![Image 51](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5aYGkrhgmHnwjiUFuqEKB6/b7fb26cb5c36f49fbb04ecb7b8c2d7ea/Frame_427321786ttt-2.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Perform annual custom reviews against Dovetail’s security posture and compliance programs.
    

*   Custom session age
    
    ![Image 52](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/27KBOmh4Ppo5qqApbE1I20/a3af4b1e92f10c8ea6bde5ed26284136/Frame_427321786ttt-3.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Customize the default session period for your workspace, and require users to reauthenticate more frequently.
    

*   SCIM user provisioning
    
    ![Image 53](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/tkuXBxyZpcmLPTzHmGYkD/6fd946c8940f4fced41a82e8ac6d76c3/Frame_427321786ttt-4.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Automate user provisioning with the System for Cross-domain Identity Management.
    

*   Custom contract and invoicing
    
    ![Image 54](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/6XrUijvCNoRjG4Zgpfvld9/6268c1ce4aa1e07b8fbbe92a2309a292/Frame_427321786ttt-5.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Negotiate certain terms of our MSA as required by your business with our custom legal contracting service.
    

#### Support

* * *

*   Help center
    
    ![Image 55](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3NPxslAdXsHBR0uKsqXyod/6a014179154578d288bdc6ae8535af98/Frame_427321786tttt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Access our detailed knowledge base to get started, learn tips, and stay up to date with the latest from Dovetail.
    

*   Dovetail Academy
    
    ![Image 56](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3L3Cr6dOM9xo0jiJnPMltJ/38ad20d695eb09f95328647bd31b3d5c/Frame_427321784ttt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    A guided learning journey with curated courses, navigable tutorials, best practices, and easy activities to empower you to leverage Dovetail your way.
    

*   Slack community
    
    ![Image 57](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/32RmljeKgTknU65d5cI48r/c75e84e565130e39321a19cf275749a9/Frame_427321784ttt-1.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Join our Slack user group and learn how others are using Dovetail, get support, share ideas, and tell us what features you’d love to see.
    

*   Email support
    
    ![Image 58](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/1wp5VR2d2AnuPdroY2ZIkD/b99ada4d223966f19404987eea10eb8c/Frame_427321784ttt-2.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Our team is always here to help with any questions that you may have.
    

*   Priority support
    
    ![Image 59](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/6SJDOYLE0MlMbFSW0f7PHT/109f71035073d00b199eff4ac6fd0c79/ddd.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Get faster, prioritized responses from our Support team. We’re always here to help.
    

*   Dedicated CSM
    
    ![Image 60](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/1CRfo2VPbRu1QnkL25Tqv7/2f230af3f6e181805db6cbc9f0942ee1/Frame_427321784ttt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    A dedicated Dovetail customer success manager will help you onboard, build solutions, support change management, and scale your team’s practice.
    

*   Onboarding support
    
    ![Image 61](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3KT7uMuyAEyHxm6EsoUQZZ/82560e894b96f85c90219d9482b1c68d/Frame_427321785tttt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    We partner with you to ensure your team can get up and running in Dovetail, fast.
    

*   Change management
    
    ![Image 62](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5HWzfeFBgasjDkO8gRJlpE/fdfd7d8185c83b5a2e982c98ba052ea1/Frame_427321785ttttt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    We help you prepare for change, gain organizational support, and deploy new ways of working to your team and company.
    

*   Workspace design
    
    ![Image 63](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3qd0WucuqVQKYzJNwKDArD/b95fcb84bc76a95652a1fd8c0c50e139/Frame_427321785tttttt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    We ensure that you’ve set up your workspace to be flexible and secure.
    

### Putting together a proposal?

Let us help you get your team on board with Dovetail. Answer a few simple questions, and we’ll generate a presentation that you can download and share with your stakeholders.

[Build a proposal](https://dovetail.com/buy/)

Users contribute data to—and do analysis within—your insights hub. Most customers buy enough users for their product management, research, and design teams. Some also buy users for their sales, customer success, support, and marketing teams to also contribute data to the insights hub.

* * *

Like users, viewers also have a user account, but they can’t upload, create, or edit. Viewers can instead only search, view, and comment on data and insights in your insights hub. Unlimited viewers are included for free to help you get customer insights in front of as many people as possible in your organization.

* * *

Access is controlled by changing a user’s role—Manager, Contributor, or Viewer—or by restricting a project or a folder to a specific user. Admins can set up user groups to make this easier on our Enterprise plans.

* * *

There’s a yearly discount available on the Professional plan. Enterprise can only be paid yearly.

* * *

No. We don’t offer discounts at this time. However, anyone is welcome to use our Free plan with its generous offerings.

* * *

Yes, you can try our Professional plan for 7 days. If you would like to try our Enterprise plan [please contact sales.](https://dovetail.com/contact-sales/) Once your free trial ends your workspace will be set to read-only until you choose a paid plan or downgrade back to Free.

* * *

No, unfortunately at the moment there is no way to pause your subscription. However, you can downgrade to a Free plan.

* * *

You’ll be able to use Dovetail for the remainder of your billing period. At the end of the billing period, we’ll keep your workspace in a read-only state for a further 30 days so you can export your data. After this 30-day download period, your data will be deleted in accordance with your data retention policy. We don’t offer refunds.

* * *

Yes. You can choose to pay via invoice for payments over $5,000 USD.

* * *

No. We only accept USD at the moment.

* * *

All prices are tax exclusive, and additional taxes (GST, VAT, US Sales Tax, etc.) may be applied to your invoice.

* * *

Yes! Let us help you get your team on board with Dovetail. Answer a few simple questions, and we’ll [generate a presentation](https://dovetail.com/buy/) that you can download and share with your stakeholders.

* * *

© Dovetail Research Pty. Ltd.

Comprehensive Pricing Overview of Dovetail's Customer Insights Hub. Including cost structures and bespoke enterprise plans. Your Customer Insight Hub solution.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Enterprise pricing requires contacting sales for a quote.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Automatically uncover insights in your customer calls and interviews. Share effortlessly with your team.
features: Automatic summarization
Highlights key moments

Auto-import and store calls, docs, and survey responses
Transcribe conversations in over 40 languages, and detect speakers
Save highlights across video, audio, documents, and notes

Thematic classification

extracted_content.content:
Pricing

Start for free
--------------

Upgrade to scale
----------------

Pay yearly and save

##### Free

###### Automatically uncover insights in your customer calls and interviews. Share effortlessly with your team

$0

Automatic summarization

Highlights key moments

Auto tags highlights

###### What you can do

Auto-import and store calls, docs, and survey responses

Transcribe conversations in over 40 languages, and detect speakers

Save highlights across video, audio, documents, and notes

Share auto-generated highlights with your team via Slack, Notion, and more

###### Usage

1 project

Unlimited transcription

Unlimited integrations

Unlimited file uploads

Save 25%

##### Professional

###### Instantly discover insights across all your customer touch points like calls, surveys and support channels

$29

per user/month

billed yearly

Global semantic search

Thematic classification

Auto creates insights

###### Everything in Free, plus:

Ask your data and insights anything

AI summarized results linked to real customer feedback

Customize your workspace with folders, filters, and views

Create project overviews and share in-depth findings as insights

Store, track, and recruit over 3m people to talk to, worldwide

###### Usage

Unlimited projects

Unlimited viewers

250 data points/month in Channels

##### Enterprise

###### Scale insights org-wide with Enterprise-grade features, access controls, and standardization

Contact sales for pricing or to request a demo

Chat with your data in Slack

Automated insights digests

Video, audio, and text redaction

###### Everything in Professional, plus:

Discover insights with conversational AI in Slack and Microsoft Teams

Configure automated text and audio digests with relevant updates

Redact video, audio, and text within transcripts to protect privacy

Control permissions with user roles, groups, and granular access control

Standardize tags, fields, and templates across the workspace

Enable stakeholders to self-service insights with homepage and search

###### Usage

Unlimited everything

* * *

#### $29

$39 billed monthly

* * *

Projects

Quickly analyze and synthesize customer feedback and share insights with stakeholders

* * *

#### Uncover insights

* * *

*   Included projects
    
    ![Image 1](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/7DHc5vZXb9Embeu2fAu6ZH/62cc9f4351efa4fd064a428449079ed3/Your_projectstt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Projects are the main ‘container’. They can contain anything from interviews to survey responses to past research.
    

1

Unlimited

Unlimited

*   Included contributors
    
    ![Image 2](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3rnBQH4EWPyVItZTnopkiQ/9a23e30aec4be48a07966c1d4c08531b/Frame_427321785tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Contributors are users who can upload, analyze, and create insights.
    

1+

1+

10+

*   Calendar integration
    
    ![Image 3](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/6hO2L6wpPobilKf6eGhgz2/84ea39357f75db16e2334b86ccb4034a/Frame_427321787.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Configure all of your customer calls to be automatically uploaded into Dovetail for instant analysis.
    

*   Data-in integrations
    
    ![Image 4](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3ststyq2Nxj53kVVkAZbuM/d82090af212d08b3aa10985425632ce9/Frame_427321786tt-3.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Get started by importing your data from existing tools including Google Drive, Zoom, OneDrive, SharePoint and many more.
    

*   Automation settings
    
    ![Image 5](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2CB4CkOaDSze029QxmIhby/b2f6b0bb12a7c60162340ab79978968d/Frame_427321793tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Choose the level of AI-powered analysis for each project.
    

*   Included viewers
    
    ![Image 6](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2R2TfWu959zf0kC29ae6Ya/64dc2c90121e9f7467d8048d93644996/Frame_427321786rr-12.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    These are users who can read and comment on data and insights, but can’t edit.
    

*   Magic transcribe
    
    ![Image 7](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/6NZYfQ3PJ4mXqcpNvLLpDP/4aae00f594f7a5c7118bbc69cac60261/Frame_427321785tt-1.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Accurately transcribe your audio and video files in 41 languages across different topics, industries, and accents.
    

*   Magic summarize
    
    ![Image 8](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2LKIcK2IEW5W93Vz28QbEu/5877bb9d1e6c6fbf5d0d253c6cbb9677/Frame_427321790tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Automatically summarize notes and identify key takeaways from your insights.
    

*   Magic highlight
    
    ![Image 9](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/1gC2hbiERLqbt6uuifTBY2/a9b24fd2af9f2856106cce9a214646c5/Frame_427321791tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Automatically find key moments in your data by accepting and rejecting suggested highlights.
    

*   Magic cluster
    
    ![Image 10](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5Yjrwwgrxx4gIHKJtDLnpa/d273954f99e636bc712acdf66aee4bb9/Frame_427321785tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Automatically identify, cluster, and label highlights by theme in canvas.
    

*   Magic insight
    
    ![Image 11](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/mMcxjcr6ebbXLGDtkpkVT/05e0416087f127b897422d3b876512d2/Frame_427321792rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    (Coming soon) Dovetail’s AI automatically creates draft insights based on summaries, highlights, and tags within your project.
    

*   Magic search
    
    ![Image 12](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/oZuQSEMZG92t1pN1yBUAF/31f918cf7a4babbbd3c28d5ee0624f00/Frame_427321786rr-13.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Semantic search, advanced filtering, and automatic, evidence-backed summaries make it easy for anyone to find key insights.
    

*   Collaborative editing
    
    ![Image 13](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2HmpMXAwVaqvGcf0L4k0x4/081b7dfe34d8aeee24ab6073e4c7c140/Frame_427321788tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Use canvas to affinity map highlights as a team and find themes together.
    

*   Survey data
    
    ![Image 14](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5bTVkeaAsw7KSBNkfMuGYD/ded7998503f9c140d6ce0e07c3e3ad92/Frame_427321789rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Upload survey response CSVs and AI will instantly summarize and highlight key takeaways.
    

*   Views
    
    ![Image 15](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/7MC1EBwpxrGNeyuryJdVbQ/fe56a9ca1171a4e72a38842612d57855/Frame_427321794tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Customize how you see and work with your data with different views. Includes grid, list, table, board and canvas.
    

*   Remove ums and ahs
    
    ![Image 16](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/0o0nIU8bxKfxAZN3dCxYg/619740d4e698e602dbbb3adf43936157/Frame_427321786tt-4.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Automatically remove the inevitable filler words in natural speech.
    

*   Translation
    
    ![Image 17](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2aLhcVZwif1rGTU1dnURJ3/ef4cf11c2035cc26759dbd0f7bcce476/Frame_427321849tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Translate transcripts and summaries into 75 languages to streamline synthesis and align global teams
    

*   Custom vocabulary
    
    ![Image 18](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/4zNAeYrV6CcntDzUXbWxCH/cf7a65189a6bc8d849ed0c45a889966a/Frame_427321786tt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Add specialized or context-specific words to expand your transcription’s vocabulary.
    

#### Organize and share

* * *

*   Web links
    
    ![Image 19](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/25IDqvUQWEa700aFhk2TEQ/721de7d0ffa814700a4be9e80a83d58c/Frame_427321786rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Share a public link, allowing anyone to view data without logging in
    

*   Highlight reels
    
    ![Image 20](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/4hRh0rs5dYVDxOph4zIwV5/0a2591a6d785051ac5c8e0f92c6b5a36/Frame_427321786rr-4.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Stream a playlist of all video and audio highlights for any of the tags created.
    

*   Share-out integrations
    
    ![Image 21](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/1JVzURrgCnnPxvYPBEFtJ8/b8eab6771d9a60f098885c69a5994442/Frame_427321786rr-5.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Share findings with your stakeholders with powerful integrations including Notion, Slack, Jira, Confluence and many more.
    

*   Embed links
    
    ![Image 22](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/7rsR9ySNvMUSA2GsM1YUPq/30c10e00fc7cd5786063cbb9949c916e/Frame_427321786rr-11.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Preview links from the tools you use including Figma, Google Docs, Vimeo and more.
    

*   Insights
    
    ![Image 23](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/297Lu3ck3Wtb4KpIYvhrIO/1af678336b21a8b941473d92416bf247/Frame_427321795rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Summarize your findings into a beautiful report for stakeholders, and embed references to data from your analysis or past findings.
    

*   Comments and mentions
    
    ![Image 24](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/7N2SJEshgNJ8xXES6yCL6g/89664d0ff84a179a79c7088b61881ff8/Frame_427321786rr-2.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Discuss research data and insights, and agree on the next steps as a team.
    

*   Insight metrics
    
    ![Image 25](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/6zsYM8XvAq2YnzbpzpdYj3/6df3ca580728b89cca05f144b6f762a2/Frame_427321786rr-3.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Understand the impact of your work with insight metrics, and discover which parts of your research are resonating with your audience.
    

*   User profiles
    
    ![Image 26](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/18jlpVyPNhGaJw8VfJRDvX/ffd3e7e1dec9fe7f3eacc21b42793f5e/user-profiles-2.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Follow and receive personal notifications when your team contribute new data or publish new insights.
    

*   Folders
    
    ![Image 27](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/7FaKSJNIR0B6DOeGTNiCfM/d7cacb3bb1e2ea1353364346ba87eb3d/Frame_427321786rr-6.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Use folders to group projects based on the team, product, active research projects or department.
    

*   Project and insight templates
    
    ![Image 28](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5L6dW6ZTnEkj6jUapl5RlB/ee3cc1bbf026be23f81d92749ae4188c/Frame_427321786rr-7.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Standardize research across your organization by setting up templates for projects and insights.
    

*   Workspace tags
    
    ![Image 29](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3ettZNCxU4AYXTwPQzewtv/14844b41fc71e76f4148036b467bc70a/Frame_427321786rr-8.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Use workspace tags to set up a tagging taxonomy that spans across your workspace.
    

*   Workspace fields
    
    ![Image 30](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/4evWD1DSoct7Yf343iflVy/9d3a78a466f140c54aa3b105760eb61b/Frame_427321786rr-9.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Set up custom fields across your workspace to add structure and allow your team to get started sooner.
    

*   Custom home and feeds
    
    ![Image 31](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5xkjAajJYSsJm1MAqAuuiu/e19d7a4f1f65cb7fd9f6ee9cfa5ffe01/Frame_427321796rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Customize your workspace home to make it work for your team’s needs. Configure feeds, change the layout, content or use search blocks to keep it feeling fresh.
    

Ask Dovetail

Customer insights at your fingertips in your flow of work \*Sold separately

* * *

*   Conversational chat
    
    ![Image 32](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2MqVdN9Lj7uj9IkubsHYnB/eba86c806137d77e19f7e4a63913b4c8/Frame_427321797rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Ask @Dovetail in a channel, and AI responds with evidence-backed summaries. Ask follow-up questions to refine results.
    

*   Audio insights podcast
    
    ![Image 33](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3PSRPqltz5xHcDjvMrhvMm/91715e3a7add5f28656d906de98aece1/Frame_427321798rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Identify projects that matter to you, and Dovetail curates and delivers a regular podcast-style update with the most relevant information.
    

*   Privacy configuration
    
    ![Image 34](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3C7SqDIte8YnC9o8dcWI7y/eb5e8017eb5bebbdf7dbecb68a7b5bc0/Frame_427321799rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Configure what data types are included in query results to protect sensitive data.
    

*   Unlimited queries
    
    ![Image 35](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2Dcj7scLyn2WTS5S9L7fw3/a410250e2ec491c6356d14cec4bcf1d0/Frame_427321800rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Ask Dovetail is available to anyone in your organization who is using Slack or Teams.
    

Recruit

Easily recruit and build your customer contacts database

* * *

*   Contacts management
    
    ![Image 36](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5c1zXU1XRjh4K7HYRRtZOC/08ed7daf5cc67610f6898dbc0503d5b0/Frame_427321801rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    A database of all of your participants, complete with auto-populated details like job title, skills, geography, and more.
    

*   AI-generated summaries
    
    ![Image 37](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5JhWUK4sqLOk7W8AloeEeE/fc03a6c10ceb468cebcff234676575ad/Frame_427321802rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Instantly see how your contacts have contributed to past research.
    

Participant recruitment

Add on

Set up research studies and source new participants from our pool of 3 million people.

Available on Professional and Enterprise: From $75

Channels

Easily track high-volume customer feedback

* * *

*   Channels included
    
    ![Image 38](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/eaX7IRntEWqBlg5RsLAaA/902990245f4525d99592631ec107836f/Frame_427321804rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    A channel is a container to continuously stream and analyze feedback sources like support tickets, NPS scores, and more.
    

Unlimited

Unlimited

*   Historical trends
    
    ![Image 39](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/7fGszEZ7kxzh4UkRYsEzhs/53c9e5d7622ccd5921e505794c5500a6/Frame_427321805rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Visualize data trends over time, and filter by date so you can hone in on the insights that matter most.
    

Unlimited

Unlimited

*   Data points
    
    ![Image 40](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/4cyttcqF9pBWnzn10bx0ji/f6e27d0a938bc6c9dd43045520f0d565/Frame_427321806rr.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Dovetail’s AI will automatically analyze and thematically classify data into themes. You have control to merge, split, and create new themes.
    

inc. 250/month

inc. 250/month

Additional data points

Add on

Sitting on mountains of feedback? Add more data capacity to your plan, and let Dovetail’s AI analyze it for you.

1000 data points / month: $500 per month

5000+ data points / month: [Contact sales](https://dovetailapp.com/contact-sales/)

#### Admin and security

* * *

*   AU, EU and USA data hosting
    
    ![Image 41](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/1g6ooDOrf53Sp66NlBHLsM/8adb1edcafd412502476882dc16cefd3/Frame_427321786111.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    New workspaces can choose to host their data in Australia, Europe or the United States to comply with local data regulations.
    

*   Encrypted data and backups
    
    ![Image 42](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/6Rw3a1BRmCrEgN8S3s667T/564dd341992bac86642c3a4df59ab16e/Frame_427321786ttt-11.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Dovetail utilizes industry-standard practices concerning the encryption of data when stored and while in transmission.
    

*   API access
    
    ![Image 43](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/6o2A0EoEUbcmyOUhe91e6/c1e9872b9ed6ec176b8dc8a7a7619e50/Frame_427321786ttt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Build on top of the Dovetail platform by automating tasks, extracting insights, and managing data more efficiently.
    

*   Access control
    
    ![Image 44](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/65a2x7s5kyAk1neSGXDfE9/89d0b65ed5a4f566600d3ec34bd7719a/Frame_427321786ttt-12.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Control who can manage, view, and edit projects with granular project permissions.
    

*   Single sign-on (SSO)
    
    ![Image 45](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/1gnmAcyoLJmf1QxLcCAiFn/76379107062d4fd1d5b7b98a148daee0/Frame_427321786ttt-13.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Dovetail has built-in single sign-on capabilities for Google and Microsoft accounts, and the option to configure your own managed identity provider.
    

*   User groups
    
    ![Image 46](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2HfZTcgYsoKfon2vYWO4AN/8cfa6d7444b52a56f75163967b91effa/Frame_427321786ttt-14.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Quickly grant access to folders, projects, tag boards, and extensions by user groups that you create and manage.
    

*   Usage analytics
    
    ![Image 47](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/2qegbobrak6Ai6oReXldiY/f0db4cde4c41164abf7c7b9083e7f3a1/Frame_427321786ttt-1.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Track the output of your team’s research over time.
    

*   Custom data retention
    
    ![Image 48](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/es2ot639IGXG4ocdx5N44/c2aba01ff196b6a8cd4208fc27fa3541/Frame_427321786ttt-7.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Set up auto-deletion of original videos without losing the video highlights to comply with your policies.
    

*   Data redaction
    
    ![Image 49](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/1O22nC8r2IRPAWpwECGexf/8e7f7342c74ff09ac7c0492234fdf37f/Frame_427321786ttt-9.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Keep your data safe and remove sensitive information by redacting any text, audio, and video.
    

*   Optional HIPAA add-on
    
    ![Image 50](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5FLssDoC7KaWKO2WkdptMa/20ef90a31037d5644602e3b203d4f1bd/Frame_427321786ttt-8.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Our optional HIPAA solution provides access controls and features to help manage PHI, such as advanced restrictions on sharing, access, and data exporting.
    

*   Security reviews
    
    ![Image 51](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5aYGkrhgmHnwjiUFuqEKB6/b7fb26cb5c36f49fbb04ecb7b8c2d7ea/Frame_427321786ttt-2.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Perform annual custom reviews against Dovetail’s security posture and compliance programs.
    

*   Custom session age
    
    ![Image 52](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/27KBOmh4Ppo5qqApbE1I20/a3af4b1e92f10c8ea6bde5ed26284136/Frame_427321786ttt-3.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Customize the default session period for your workspace, and require users to reauthenticate more frequently.
    

*   SCIM user provisioning
    
    ![Image 53](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/tkuXBxyZpcmLPTzHmGYkD/6fd946c8940f4fced41a82e8ac6d76c3/Frame_427321786ttt-4.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Automate user provisioning with the System for Cross-domain Identity Management.
    

*   Custom contract and invoicing
    
    ![Image 54](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/6XrUijvCNoRjG4Zgpfvld9/6268c1ce4aa1e07b8fbbe92a2309a292/Frame_427321786ttt-5.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Negotiate certain terms of our MSA as required by your business with our custom legal contracting service.
    

#### Support

* * *

*   Help center
    
    ![Image 55](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3NPxslAdXsHBR0uKsqXyod/6a014179154578d288bdc6ae8535af98/Frame_427321786tttt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Access our detailed knowledge base to get started, learn tips, and stay up to date with the latest from Dovetail.
    

*   Dovetail Academy
    
    ![Image 56](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3L3Cr6dOM9xo0jiJnPMltJ/38ad20d695eb09f95328647bd31b3d5c/Frame_427321784ttt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    A guided learning journey with curated courses, navigable tutorials, best practices, and easy activities to empower you to leverage Dovetail your way.
    

*   Slack community
    
    ![Image 57](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/32RmljeKgTknU65d5cI48r/c75e84e565130e39321a19cf275749a9/Frame_427321784ttt-1.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Join our Slack user group and learn how others are using Dovetail, get support, share ideas, and tell us what features you’d love to see.
    

*   Email support
    
    ![Image 58](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/1wp5VR2d2AnuPdroY2ZIkD/b99ada4d223966f19404987eea10eb8c/Frame_427321784ttt-2.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Our team is always here to help with any questions that you may have.
    

*   Priority support
    
    ![Image 59](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/6SJDOYLE0MlMbFSW0f7PHT/109f71035073d00b199eff4ac6fd0c79/ddd.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    Get faster, prioritized responses from our Support team. We’re always here to help.
    

*   Dedicated CSM
    
    ![Image 60](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/1CRfo2VPbRu1QnkL25Tqv7/2f230af3f6e181805db6cbc9f0942ee1/Frame_427321784ttt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    A dedicated Dovetail customer success manager will help you onboard, build solutions, support change management, and scale your team’s practice.
    

*   Onboarding support
    
    ![Image 61](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3KT7uMuyAEyHxm6EsoUQZZ/82560e894b96f85c90219d9482b1c68d/Frame_427321785tttt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    We partner with you to ensure your team can get up and running in Dovetail, fast.
    

*   Change management
    
    ![Image 62](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/5HWzfeFBgasjDkO8gRJlpE/fdfd7d8185c83b5a2e982c98ba052ea1/Frame_427321785ttttt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    We help you prepare for change, gain organizational support, and deploy new ways of working to your team and company.
    

*   Workspace design
    
    ![Image 63](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmu68mmhtb17/3qd0WucuqVQKYzJNwKDArD/b95fcb84bc76a95652a1fd8c0c50e139/Frame_427321785tttttt.png?w=248&h=204&q=80&fm=png)
    
    We ensure that you’ve set up your workspace to be flexible and secure.
    

### Putting together a proposal?

Let us help you get your team on board with Dovetail. Answer a few simple questions, and we’ll generate a presentation that you can download and share with your stakeholders.

[Build a proposal](https://dovetailapp.com/buy/)

Users contribute data to—and do analysis within—your insights hub. Most customers buy enough users for their product management, research, and design teams. Some also buy users for their sales, customer success, support, and marketing teams to also contribute data to the insights hub.

* * *

Like users, viewers also have a user account, but they can’t upload, create, or edit. Viewers can instead only search, view, and comment on data and insights in your insights hub. Unlimited viewers are included for free to help you get customer insights in front of as many people as possible in your organization.

* * *

Access is controlled by changing a user’s role—Manager, Contributor, or Viewer—or by restricting a project or a folder to a specific user. Admins can set up user groups to make this easier on our Enterprise plans.

* * *

There’s a yearly discount available on the Professional plan. Enterprise can only be paid yearly.

* * *

No. We don’t offer discounts at this time. However, anyone is welcome to use our Free plan with its generous offerings.

* * *

Yes, you can try our Professional plan for 7 days. If you would like to try our Enterprise plan [please contact sales.](https://dovetailapp.com/contact-sales/) Once your free trial ends your workspace will be set to read-only until you choose a paid plan or downgrade back to Free.

* * *

No, unfortunately at the moment there is no way to pause your subscription. However, you can downgrade to a Free plan.

* * *

You’ll be able to use Dovetail for the remainder of your billing period. At the end of the billing period, we’ll keep your workspace in a read-only state for a further 30 days so you can export your data. After this 30-day download period, your data will be deleted in accordance with your data retention policy. We don’t offer refunds.

* * *

Yes. You can choose to pay via invoice for payments over $5,000 USD.

* * *

No. We only accept USD at the moment.

* * *

All prices are tax exclusive, and additional taxes (GST, VAT, US Sales Tax, etc.) may be applied to your invoice.

* * *

Yes! Let us help you get your team on board with Dovetail. Answer a few simple questions, and we’ll [generate a presentation](https://dovetailapp.com/buy/) that you can download and share with your stakeholders.

* * *

© Dovetail Research Pty. Ltd.

Comprehensive Pricing Overview of Dovetail's Customer Insights Hub. Including cost structures and bespoke enterprise plans. Your Customer Insight Hub solution.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Enterprise pricing is quote-based and requires contacting sales.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Automatically uncover insights in your customer calls and interviews. Share effortlessly with your team.
features: Automatic summarization
Highlights key moments
Auto tags highlights
Auto-import and store calls, docs, and survey responses
Transcribe conversations in over 40 languages, and detect speakers
Save highlights across video, audio, documents, and notes
Share auto-generated highlights with your team via Slack, Notion, and more

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Instantly discover insights across all your customer touch points like calls, surveys and support channels.
features: Global semantic search
Thematic classification
Auto creates insights
Ask your data and insights anything
AI summarized results linked to real customer feedback
Customize your workspace with folders, filters, and views
Create project overviews and share in-depth findings as insights
Store, track, and recruit over 3m people to talk to, worldwide

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Scale insights org-wide with Enterprise-grade features, access controls, and standardization.
features: Chat with your data in Slack
Automated insights digests
Video, audio, and text redaction
Discover insights with conversational AI in Slack and Microsoft Teams
Configure automated text and audio digests with relevant updates
Redact video, audio, and text within transcripts to protect privacy
Control permissions with user roles, groups, and granular access control
Standardize tags, fields, and templates across the workspace
Enable stakeholders to self-service insights with homepage and search

additional_fees.fee_description: Available on Professional and Enterprise plans.
